import React from 'react' const Welcome = () => { const titleStyle = { color: "#7fccbd", fontSize: "50pt", fontWeight: "normal", margin: "0px" } const subtitleStyle = { color: "white", fontSize: "16pt", fontWeight: "normal", padding: "10px" } const imgDivStyle = { width: "50%", margin: "auto" } const imgStyle = { width: "100%", objectFit: "cover", } return (
{/* when phone sized hide img and make welcom card 100% */}

Javier
Violante

Software Engineer, Game Programmer

) } export default Welcome
